Vladlen Kaveev

Resume

About Me

I’m a mobile developer focused on building cross-platform iOS and Android applications using React Native. I started my journey in development by learning Swift and Java, which provided me with a strong understanding of native technologies. This background enables me to write Native Modules when necessary, bridging the gap between native capabilities and cross-platform solutions. My experience is dedicated entirely to mobile development, and I have successfully completed over 20 projects, allowing me to bring focused expertise to creating efficient and user-friendly mobile applications.

Experience

Instadapp

React Native Developer

Instadapp revolutionizes DeFi accessibility by providing users with a seamless gateway to the most optimal DeFi strategies available.

  • Worked on the Avocado Wallet cryptocurrency wallet, focusing on internal browser functionality, transaction processing, and security.
  • Developed and optimized the internal browser for seamless and secure interaction with decentralized applications (dApps).
  • Implemented transaction handling features, ensuring accurate and efficient processing of crypto transactions.
  • Enhanced security protocols, integrating multi-layer encryption and improving wallet data protection.
  • Collaborated with backend teams to integrate blockchain transactions and ensure data consistency and real-time synchronization.
  • Conducted rigorous testing and performance optimization to ensure the app’s reliability and scalability for secure financial operations.

Edostav

React Native Developer | DevOps

Edostav is a delivery platform featuring three mobile apps: one for customers to order and track deliveries, another for couriers to manage tasks, and one for partners to handle orders. The platform has over 200k+ downloads, 10k+ positive reviews, and a 9-year presence on the App Store and Google Play.

  • Developed a new version of the app for customers, adding new features and enhancing the overall user experience.
  • Developed applications for couriers and partners, improving logistics and operational efficiency.
  • Ensured seamless integration of customer-facing features with backend systems, optimizing performance and responsiveness across both iOS and Android platforms.
  • Set up a custom CI/CD pipeline using Fastlane and GitLab Runner, automating build, testing, and deployment processes.
  • Configured Fastlane for full app publishing functionality, including automatic app store submissions for both iOS and Android.
  • Enhanced app architecture, focusing on scalability and maintainability for long- term project growth.
  • Contributed to improving app security and optimizing performance for a better user experience.
  • Supported the maintenance and monitoring of applications, ensuring optimal performance across all platforms.
  • 200k+ downloads across various markets, 10k+ positive reviews, and 9 years of solid presence on both the App Store and Google Play, demonstrating the app’s strong market reputation and reliability.
react-native typescript maps geolocation firebase push-notifications fastlane gitlab-runner in-app-purchase

EtoSlon

React Native Developer | Team Lead

EtoSlon is a photo editing app that allows users to create unique designs with advanced tools and custom templates. The app has over 20k+ downloads, 50+ positive reviews, and a 3-year presence on the App Store and Google Play.

  • Led a small development team, overseeing the implementation of key features and ensuring smooth collaboration.
  • Managed the Agile Scrum board, facilitating sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives to ensure timely delivery of milestones.
  • Described technical tasks, breaking down complex features into manageable units and coordinating work across the team.
  • Collaborated with the team to estimate tasks, ensuring realistic timelines and effective resource allocation.
  • Oversaw the app publishing process and managed regular updates to both iOS and Android stores.
  • Worked on a photo editing application, enabling users to edit and enhance images with various tools, such as filters, cropping, and retouching.
  • Integrated image processing libraries to optimize photo manipulation features, ensuring smooth performance even for large images.
  • Focused on enhancing user experience (UX) with intuitive photo editing tools and real-time preview capabilities.
  • Optimized the app’s performance, addressing issues such as memory usage and response time during intensive image processing tasks.
  • 20k+ downloads across various markets, 50+ positive reviews, and 3 years of solid presence on both the App Store and Google Play, demonstrating the app’s reliability and popularity.
react-native typescript redux-toolkit firebase photo-editing push-notifications in-app-purchase camera-roll agile scrum

GetGain

React Native Developer

GetGain is an outsourcing company specializing in custom software development, delivering tailored solutions for clients across various industries.

  • Started my career as a React Native Developer at GetGain, an outsourcing company, while in my third year of university.
  • Contributed to the development of multiple client projects, focusing on building cross-platform mobile applications for various industries.
  • Gained experience in the full development cycle, from requirements gathering and design to implementation, testing, and deployment.
  • Worked closely with clients to understand project needs and deliver high-quality, scalable mobile applications.
  • In my final year with the company, actively took part in project evaluations and played a role in estimating the complexity and timelines for new projects.
  • Took on a leadership role within the mobile development team, coordinating tasks, and ensuring that the team met deadlines and project goals.
  • Implemented and maintained CI/CD pipelines across multiple projects, using tools such as GitLab CI, Fastlane, and Jenkins to automate testing, building, and deployment processes.
  • Improved team productivity and streamlined the deployment process by reducing manual interventions and ensuring smoother, more reliable releases.
  • Actively mentored junior developers and shared best practices for mobile app development and CI/CD practices.
  • Developed a deep understanding of React Native and mobile development, contributing to projects that helped clients achieve their business goals.

Edostav - Food delivery app

Focused on scalability and performance, accommodating high traffic during peak hours.

Crypto wallet app

Developed a feature-rich mobile application for managing decentralized finance (DeFi) portfolios. Integrated multiple Web3 protocols to enable seamless token swaps, transaction management, and real-time portfolio tracking. Utilized React Native for cross-platform compatibility, ensuring high performance and a responsive user interface.
